headers.value: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://api.mapbox.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://unpkg.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.mapbox.com https://api.friendlycaptcha.com; img-src 'self' data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://api.mapbox.com; font-src 'self' data:; worker-src blob:; child-src blob:; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'none'; form-action 'none'
